{"id":964282737,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"5 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1685959162,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"160 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/964282737/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Sum in a Matrix","memory":"48 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int matrixSum(vector<vector<int>>& nums) {\n        int ans = 0;\n        for(int i = 0; i < nums.size(); ++i){\n            sort(nums[i].begin(), nums[i].end());\n        }\n        for(int c = 0; c < nums[0].size(); ++c){\n            int t = 0;\n            for(int r = 0; r <nums.size(); ++r){\n                t = max(t, nums[r][c]);\n            }\n            ans += t;\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"sum-in-a-matrix","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
